trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around October 21st 2007
divs: sighting detailsit was between 5-5:30 am on oct.21 when we got home.we were getting out of the car when at first we noticed an extremely bright and unusually large star.we were saying how it was actually emanating light like the moon does when i started to see it change shapes.i could've sworn it was getting "longer" then contracting smaller again.over and over i thought it was doing that.i asked my boyfriend and he said he noticed that but it was probably the fact that it was so bright that it appeared to be doing that since we're so far. i grabbed my binoculars and what i saw looked nothing like a star.it looked like a multi color translucent cone or what i called it was an octopus.the tip was white blue (like the color of stars) that faded into green then orange and yellow towards what appeared to be like octopus legs spreading outward in a cone shape.i continued watching it and i could've sworn the legs were swaying and contracting,yet it remained in the same general spot in relation to the stars.then we both started seeing shooting stars that were that same color light blue coming downward.he saw 3 total and i saw 2 during this 2 hour period all together all while we were trading off with the binoculars. after stopping our neighbor that walked by and pointing out to him we asked him if he thought it was an unusually bright star and if he saw it changing or moving at all.he said he did too and we all kept watching it.i then looked at it again with the binoculars and its completely a different shape and size.it now looked like a circle ,still with the same colors,and separated "legs" but with white dots on the end of each "leg".the closest thing i could compare it to would be a far away firework shape. it then appeared to rotate horizontally making it look more like a flat disk,as if the shape was thin and had turned on its side.after the initial things we thought it could be like a plane,or light tower or something reflecting off the sun and after both of us telling each other out loud that we're not crazy we thought maybe it could be a meteor since all the shooting stars,then we thought it was missile testing(which we have actually seen before and later found out that's what it was).the sun was barely rising and it remained bright despite the other stars noticeably fading.the strange thing is that it remained in that position in relation to its neighboring stars while it changed shapes and got brighter then darker,bigger then smaller. we went inside before the sun came up and when we last looked at it it was slightly smaller but still as bright.we compared the clarity we saw when viewing a passing plane using the binoculars to the clarity we saw when looking at it and it was just as clear which makes me think it had to have been close. i could draw a picture in color of exactly what it looked like in all the shapes. my main concerns were that given that we are at war it was another 9\11 type thing and the other fear that worried me was fact that this incident was accompanied by so many shooting stars.i am hoping to hear that it was some random "testing" or that it was a local entertainment venue.as long as i gain some kind of confirmation that there was indeed something more than just a star and that our eyes and in this case extremely vivid imaginations weren't playing tricks on us. we both know what we saw and im hoping this site might help us find out what it was.
Summary: We saw an extremely bright "star".Then it changed shape,with binoculars saw a multi-color cone that shifted to a disc/circle
